name: CompareDependencyChanges
description:
Get dependency changes between two commits of a repository.

Use this tool to retrieve a diff of dependency changes based on updates to dependency manifests between two specified commits in a GitHub repository. It is useful for understanding what dependencies have been added, removed, or updated.

parameters.name: repository_owner_name
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository to compare. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: base_and_head_commit_specification
parameters.description: Specify the base and head commits in the format `{base}...{head}` for comparison.

value_schema.description: The base and head Git revisions to compare. The Git revisions will be resolved to commit SHAs. Named revisions will be resolved to their corresponding HEAD commits, and an appropriate merge base will be determined. This parameter expects the format `{base}...{head}`.

parameters.name: dependency_manifest_file_path
parameters.description: The full path, relative to the repository root, of the dependency manifest file.

value_schema.description: The full path, relative to the repository root, of the dependency manifest file.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The full path, relative to the repository root, of the dependency manifest file.

value_schema.description: The full path, relative to the repository root, of the dependency manifest file.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: basehead
parameters.description: The base and head Git revisions to compare. The Git revisions will be resolved to commit SHAs. Named revisions will be resolved to their corresponding HEAD commits, and an appropriate merge base will be determined. This parameter expects the format `{base}...{head}`.

value_schema.description: The base and head Git revisions to compare. The Git revisions will be resolved to commit SHAs. Named revisions will be resolved to their corresponding HEAD commits, and an appropriate merge base will be determined. This parameter expects the format `{base}...{head}`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
